lines.text: [about his gun]
Easy to pick up, hard to put down.
What's going on? Why are you putting yourself out for this schmuck? I don't understand you. You got a serious case of conscience.
He's my best friend, Mr. Weng.
Buddy, this ain't no kindergarten.
Are you always so determined?
Yes, it's my style.
Mine too.

[subtitled version]
He looks determined... without being ruthless. There's something heroic about him. He doesn't look like a killer. He comes across so calm... acts like he has a dream... eyes full of passion.
I thought those I killed deserved to die. Now I believe everbody has the right to live.
I always leave one bullet, either for myself or for my enemy.
You're an unusual cop.
Well, you're an unusual killer.
I believe in justice, but nobody trusts me.
I have the same problem.
Would you rather see me dead or set free?
Neither, if fate spares us.
You always were a pain in the ass, as far as I'm concerned. Just do me a favor and prove me wrong.
I'm not interested in any goddamn rules! I want the bastard dead!
Life's cheap. It only takes one bullet... He's no ordinary assassin; I hope we're just looking for one man. If I'm not mistaken, this man is not a cold-blooded murderer.
It only takes one bullet, cold-blooded or not.
Do all killers have a sense of honor?
The world has changed. Honor is now a dirty word.
You sang beautifully just now.
I sing for him, and he isn't here.
Jeffrey? You sing with such emotion about him. I feel like I know him. Thanks for sharing something so important.
I just wish he were here now.
Wherever he may roam, you'll be in his thoughts, Jenny. The better part of him will always be here.
You can't win all the time. But you can't lose forever, either.
[Danny points a gun at Jeff]
Don't move!
Who is it?
It's Dumbo. He's come to say bon voyage.
We're the same.
No, we're not the same! I uphold the law and you break it!
Arrest me later! Fight now!
I think you and I could be friends.
If I put my gun down, right? That's your condition?
Can you do it? (No response) At least we can be temporary friends. We have a common enemy.
I wish I could have a friend like you.
You will, in the next life.
Sometimes I think you're not human.
Sometimes dogs are superior to men.
Don't let me die like this. I hate it. Will you give me a hero's death, old friend? You see, I... I didn't keep one last bullet.
I understand, Sydney. I have one.
They aren't just gonna let me walk out. I have no future! Can't you see that? Walk out and tell 'em you're a cop; see what happens to you! You think that'll make any difference?
Don't hurt her, you maniac!
No, I won't hurt her. I'll blow her head off!
I felt someone walk over my grave.
I've changed - I don't want to kill.
He's heroic in manner. He doesn't look like a killer
I did it for you, Jeff, the only friend I ever had.
